issue.title: [JS] Upgrade to TS 2.7.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2123](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2123). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Primarily motivated by the latest release of typedoc, which skipped over 2.6.2 and supports 2.7.1
